title: Gold Near Record High as Inflation Data Supports Rate-Cut Bets
description: Gold hovered near a record high, after slower-than-expected inflation in the US supported bets for more interest-rate cuts.
content: Gold hovered near a record high, after slower-than-expected inflation in the US supported bets for more interest-rate cuts.
